questions.title: SQL Injection Attack
questions.prompt: Explain what a SQL injection attack is and how it can be prevented.
followups: What are parameterized queries and how do they prevent SQL injection?
Can you provide an example of a SQL injection payload?

questions.title: Zero Trust Architecture
questions.prompt: Explain the core principles of Zero Trust security architecture.
followups: How does Zero Trust differ from traditional perimeter-based security?
What are some challenges in implementing Zero Trust?

questions.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
questions.prompt: Describe the different types of XSS attacks and their potential impact.
followups: How does Content Security Policy (CSP) help prevent XSS?
What's the difference between stored XSS and reflected XSS?

questions.title: Penetration Testing Process
questions.prompt: Walk through the typical phases of a penetration test.
followups: What is the difference between black box and white box testing?
Why is reconnaissance important in the penetration testing process?

questions.title: Incident Response Steps
questions.prompt: Describe the key steps in an incident response process.
followups: What should be included in an incident response plan?
How do you prioritize incidents based on severity?

questions.title: OWASP Top 10
questions.prompt: Name and briefly describe three vulnerabilities from the OWASP Top 10.
followups: Why is broken access control a common web application vulnerability?
How can security misconfigurations be prevented?

questions.title: Cryptographic Hash Functions
questions.prompt: Explain what cryptographic hash functions are and their properties.
followups: How are hash functions used in password storage?
What is a salt and why is it important in password hashing?

questions.title: Man-in-the-Middle Attacks
questions.prompt: Explain how a man-in-the-middle attack works and common prevention methods.
followups: How does certificate pinning help prevent MITM attacks?
What role do Certificate Authorities play in preventing MITM?

questions.title: Security Information and Event Management
questions.prompt: What is SIEM and how does it help security teams?
followups: What types of data sources feed into a SIEM?
How does correlation differ from simple log collection?

questions.title: Network Segmentation
questions.prompt: Explain the concept of network segmentation and its security benefits.
followups: What is the principle of least privilege in network design?
How does microsegmentation differ from traditional segmentation?

questions.title: DDoS Attacks
questions.prompt: Describe how a DDoS attack works and common mitigation strategies.
followups: What's the difference between volumetric and application-layer DDoS attacks?
How do CDNs help mitigate DDoS attacks?

questions.title: Risk Assessment
questions.prompt: Explain the basic components of a cybersecurity risk assessment.
followups: How do you calculate risk using likelihood and impact?
What's the difference between inherent risk and residual risk?

questions.title: Public Key Infrastructure
questions.prompt: Explain how Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) works and its main components.
followups: What is a Certificate Authority and what role does it play in PKI?
How does certificate revocation work?

questions.title: Endpoint Detection and Response
questions.prompt: What is EDR and how does it differ from traditional antivirus?
followups: What types of behaviors does EDR typically monitor for?
How does EDR help with incident investigation?

questions.title: Buffer Overflow
questions.prompt: Explain what a buffer overflow vulnerability is and how it can be exploited.
followups: What are some modern protections against buffer overflow attacks?
How does Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) help?
